Container.Name: CritterCatcherAI
Container.Overview: CritterCatcherAI v2.0 - Advanced animal detection system using two-stage pipeline (YOLO + CLIP/ViT). Download Ring videos, detect animals, review with multi-select UI, provide feedback to improve accuracy, and retrain models. Supports Hedgehogs, Birds, and 80+ COCO object categories.

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging verbosity: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR

Config.Name: Web Interface Port
Config.Description: Web GUI port - Animal Profiles, Review Images, Model Management

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Main data directory - stores profiles, review frames, training data

Config.Name: Performance
Config.Description: Expected Performance: CPU (4-core): 3-5 frames/sec. With GPU: 15-20 frames/sec
